subject: Ensure auth refresh keeps isAuthenticated true
description: packages/web/src/hooks/use-auth.ts:45-47,151-152: setTokens only updates access/refresh tokens. If isAuthenticated is false (e.g., rehydrate bug or after logout), refreshAccessToken can succeed but UI still treats user as unauthenticated. Consider setting isAuthenticated=true and isLoading=false when tokens are refreshed.
